Title: View Phones category (page 1)
Precondition: User is logged in OR guest
Expected Result: Only phone products are displayed on first page

Title: View Laptops category (page 1)
Precondition: User is logged in OR guest
Expected Result: Only laptop products are displayed on first page

Title: View Monitors category (page 1)
Precondition: User is logged in OR guest
Expected Result: Only monitor products are displayed on first page

Title: Previous button on page 2 of category
Steps:
1. Go to a category
2. Navigate to page 2
3. Click Previous
Expected Result: Goes back to previous page of the same category
Actual Result: Returns to main page with all products

Title: Verify category name highlighted after selection
Expected Result: The selected category should be highlighted ( visually marked)

Title: Verify product details (image, name, price) display correctly for selected category
Expected Result: Product name, image, and price should display correctly

Title: Verify “Next” button is disabled or hidden on the last page of category
Precondition: Open category (Phones/Laptops/Monitors) and navigate to last page
Steps:
1. Click “Next” until last page
2. Observe “Next” button
Expected Result: “Next” button should be disabled or hidden when on last page
Actual Result: “Next” button not visible on last page
